sub_title: Director Legal, Risk & Compliance at Trifleet Leasing
summary:
Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work. That captures my attitude towards how I enjoy working. Being it legal work or any other area of expertise I encounter. I always enjoy to challenge myself and my colleagues and to learn new insights of the interrelation of legal with the other business departments. That eagerness allows me to enhance the quality of my legal work and helps me understand the multidisciplinary playing field a legal professional encounters while working in an international organisation. I developed the ability to look beyond the typical legal and compliance aspects of my responsibilities and also take the operational, financial and commercial aspects into account. 

As Legal Director I make sure we conduct our business in a safe, ethical and legally compliant manner whilst always have as objective to provide pragmatic solutions and create awareness. I don’t just say ‘no’ or try to just fix a problem with a solution. I take a step back to identify the purpose of an activity, assess what part is non-compliant and work together with my colleagues and other officers to find a way to the required result and that’s compliant with the legal framework we operate in as a company.

I have experience working in IT, international construction, maritime industry and (asset) leasing. I’m characterized having a strong sense of responsibility, entrepreneurship and hands on work mentality. During my career I have acquired skills in global legal matters, contracting, M&A, governance and compliance framework for the group’s legal exposure. I’m experienced in negotiating, drafting and reviewing various commercial contracts, managing external attorneys in court cases on various topics, organizing and advising on corporate (re)structuring. Always optimizing shareholders and corporate interest, working closely together with colleagues and external legal advisors. Familiar and accomplished working in teams, either with legal professionals as well as non-legal colleagues, but also working individually as a sole in-house legal counsel and managing teams of legal and non-legal professionals. 

Keywords: senior legal counsel – general counsel – head of legal – chief legal officer – legal director

profile_positions.description:
As Director Legal, Risk & Compliance I’m responsible for all legal and compliance matters within Trifleet Leasing. Legal matters such as contract negotiations and finding pragmatic solutions for legal challenges. The compliance matters include compliance due diligence, solidifying the corporate compliance framework, and promote compliance throughout the company by training programs and presentations. In my daily work I focus on standardizing and streamlining legal & compliance aspects in the business operations. This standardization creates the opportunity for myself to spend time on the important and more complicated subjects as well as empowers non-legal colleagues to feel comfortable handling the legal aspects of their work (mostly) independently. Ultimately, my goal is to maintain a legal and compliance department with work flows and procedures that minimize interruptions in the internal business processes and maximize an adequate mitigation of risks. I enjoy working in close corporation with my colleagues within Trifleet's offices and within our shareholder's group of companies. I regularly take part in multidisciplinary project teams where I aim to not only contribute with my legal and compliance expertise, but to also bring my strong sense of business acumen and analytics, my focus on pragmatism, and my favorite thing above anything else, to learn new skills and subject matter!

Since July 2022 I’m officially member of the Trifleet Management Team. As MT we ensure Trifleet continues to provide sustainable leasing excellence as one of the major global tank container lessors. We focus on our employees, invest in their well-being, growth and productivity, and promote a positive, safe and inclusive work environment. We commit to work in a safe, sustainable and ethical way, and ensure full compliance with laws and regulations.

Trifleet Leasing is a global top 5 tank container leasing company and is a subsidiary of GATX Corporation, a NYSE-listed public company.
profile_positions.title: Director Legal, Risk & Compliance

profile_positions.description:
As Legal Counsel I'm responsible for setting up the legal and compliance department at Trifleet Leasing a global top 5 tank container leasing company. It's my goal and approach to make sure we can do our business successfully and efficiently while we comply with the requirements set by legal, compliance and regulations. Besides negotiating and drafting commercial contracts, I take part in the commercial, operational and strategic projects making sure the legal and compliance aspects are addressed and the risks are mitigated. Another important part of my job is to provide compliance guidance to all levels of management and employees. I develop corporate compliance policies, procedures, guidelines and programs in close corporation with our colleagues within Trifleet's offices and within our shareholder's group of companies. 
Since December 2020 Trifleet is part of the GATX Corporation, a NYSE-listed public company. GATX is a leading global rail car leasing company based in Chicago and founded in 1898.
profile_positions.title: Legal Counsel

profile_positions.description:
As Head of Legal of the Radio Holland Group (“RHG”) I was responsible for all legal and compliance matters RH group wide (a total of 25 separate legal entities, consisting 70+ offices around the world). This included among others to determine the group’s legal & compliance strategy, to develop and maintain the governance, risk and compliance framework, to identify and mitigate legal risks, take care of the legal matters and support and advise all Radio Holland group companies. As Head of Legal I reported to the CEO of RHG. 
Besides that I was MT-member of the senior management on global level, internally referred to as the Global Leadership Team (GLT). In that team I focused on Radio Holland's global company strategy re. employees, customers and suppliers, our innovations and new business ventures. Besides being ultimately responsible for legal and compliance globally I was also responsible for QHSE and the Surveyor and regulatory business. More specifically, heading the regional managers and ensuring that the global strategy is executed accordingly, whilst functioning as the conduit between the GLT and the QHSE and surveyor/regulatory teams. 
I worked closely together with the RH group companies’ officers and a range of RH colleagues all over the world, as well as with the legal community within the Pon Holding’s group of companies, on several legal and multi-disciplinary tasks, projects and challenges, always aimed to ensure that Radio Holland conducts its business in a way that is both ethical and legally compliant.

Radio Holland is a well-respected and well-known and worldwide supplier of Navigation and Communication solutions in the maritime industry. Besides that, Radio Holland provides Service and Maintenance aboard vessels all over the world with an unrivalled global network of 80 establishments along the big shipping routes.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Legal

profile_positions.description:
As the legal counsel within the Radio Holland Group I was responsible for the roll-out of the Governance, Risk & Compliance framework group-wide. Besides international contracts, legal matters and support, I identified and mitigated legal risks with practical solutions and ensured these solutions were borne and maintained by all regions/entities. Furthermore, I collaborated closely with a range of colleagues, in the Netherlands and over the whole world, give (asked and unasked) advice, help build and ensure the legal awareness on subjects such as (export) compliance, anti-bribery and competition laws.
On group level I was responsible for the compliance to internal and external policies and ensured the compliance to the GDPR (AVG) for all Radio Holland entities in the world. Lastly, I also worked closely together with the General Counsel of our holding company and supporting all M&A activities.
profile_positions.title: Legal Counsel

profile_positions.description:
Sole legal counsel at Certhon Build B.V., Certhon is an international greenhouse solutions provider which supplies and constructs international turnkey projects all over the world. Within the Certhon group I was the sole in-house legal counsel responsible for all internal and external legal matters, Besides my day-to-day legal work I was also ultimately responsible for the all legal matters within the Certhon Group, our foreign entities and compliance with local and international legislation.
Furthermore I was MT-member and took part of the MT strategy work group making sure the legal and compliance aspects are part of the discussions and decisions regarding the management of the day-to-business as well as whilst determining the company's future.
